description:
In nova home page at launchpad (https://launchpad.net/nova/) under downloads section, it shows "Latest version is 2011.2".
This can be seen on right side pane of the home page.
Also the tarball link should be updated to point to diablo tarball 2011.3
title: Nova home page still shows Cactus release as latest build available for download

comments.content:
In nova home page at launchpad (https://launchpad.net/nova/) under downloads section, it shows "Latest version is 2011.2".
This can be seen on right side pane of the home page.
Also the tarball link should be updated to point to diablo tarball 2011.3
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sateesh-chodapuneedi

comments.content: Not a Nova bug, but thanks for warning us ! I fixed it by setting old versions obsolete, apparently LP has a bug about which version it should show.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
